submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        self.ans = 0
        n = len(nums)
        self.memo = {}
        def dfs(start, last_i, last_j):
            if start>=n:
                self.ans+=1
                # print("FOUND")
                return 1
            if (start, last_i, last_j) in self.memo:
                self.ans+= self.memo[(start, last_i, last_j)]
                return self.memo[(start, last_i, last_j)]
            curr = nums[start]
            cnt = 0
            for i in range(last_i, curr+1):
                j = curr-i
                if j>last_j:
                    continue
                # print ("CHECKING INSIDE", (i, curr-i))
                cnt += dfs(start+1, i, curr-i)
            self.memo[(start, last_i, last_j)]=cnt
            return cnt
        j = max(nums)
        MOD = (10**9)+7
        dfs(0, 0, j)
        return self.ans%MOD
